TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TextLine extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class TextLine Implements IDisposable
public ref class TextLine abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 為文字行提供用來支援格式化服務的抽象類別。

span.span: Provides an abstract class for supporting formatting services to a line of text.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Media.TextFormatting.TextLineBreak GetTextLineBreak() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetTextLineBreak () As TextLineBreak

summary.span: 取得遭到分行符號處理序分行時的行狀態。

span.span: Gets the state of the line when broken by line breaking process.

returns.span: 表示分行符號的 值。

span.span: A value that represents the line break.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回值是`null`行結尾的段落結尾。The return value is `null` when the line ends at the end of the paragraph. 文字格式器用戶端可能會以參數來傳回傳遞傳回值方法，可讓相同的段落中的下一行的格式時所要使用的值。The text formatter client may pass the return value back as a parameter to the method, which allows the value to be used when formatting the next line within the same paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值設定時，才屬性設，和一個單字是大於格式化的段落寬度。The property value is set only when the property of is set to , and a single word is wider than the formatting paragraph width. 在這種情況下，截斷接受所要的行為所指定之單字中間列設定。In such situation, truncates the line in the middle of the word to honor the desired behavior specified by setting.
